reviewText: Again, Teepa teaches like no other.  If someone wants to understand dementia, Teepa is the one to go to.  Teepa takes you on a journey through the experiences of people diagnosed with dementia and caregivers as well. She will engage you, make you laugh, make you cry, and make you GET IT. Teepa is North America's most grand resource when it comes to dementia care.  We are all lucky to have her.
